犓字的基本解释

犓
chú
用草料喂牲畜：“故莫不犓牛羊，豢犬彘。”
指牲畜：“（子墨子）非以犓豢煎炙之味以为不甘也。”

犓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chú］
［《廣韻》測隅切，平虞，初。］
(1)用割下的草喂牛。亦泛指喂养牛羊等。
(2)泛指牛羊等牲畜。参见“犓牛”、“犓豢”。

犓字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犓； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页703第13
【唐韻】測愚切【集韻】窻兪切，?音芻。【說文】以芻莝養牛也。从牛芻，芻亦聲。春秋國語曰：犓豢幾何。【玉篇】今作芻。【集韻】俗作?，非是。?字右上从作，不从丑，類似皺俗作?。又??。

犓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
犓字的起名意思

暂无。

K
Basic explanation of words
K
chú
Feed the livestock with fodder: "Therefore, it is not for cattle, sheep, and dogs."
Refers to livestock: "(Zimozi) is not unwilling to think that it is not because of the smell of fried rice."
K
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chú]
["Guangyun" test corner cut, Pingyu, early. ]
(1) Feed the cows with the cut grass. Also refers to feeding cattle and sheep.
(2) Generally refers to livestock such as cattle and sheep. See "Yaniu", "Yang".
K
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Si Ji 2】【Cow Character Department】　犓; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 703 13
【Tang Yun】Testing Yuqi 【Jiyun】Single-cutting, and sound. [Said the text] It is also to raise cattle with spitting. From the cattle, the humble also sounds. The Spring and Autumn Period Mandarin says: Geometry. [Jade articles] This is a humble opinion. [Ji Yun] Popular writing? No, yes. The upper right of the word "is written from , not from ugliness, similar to wrinkled custom. also??.
